TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Log extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于将事件和异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides a property and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Log`对象提供了一个简单的入口点，从中访问 .NET Framework 的日志记录服务。The `My.Application.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the .NET Framework's logging services. `WriteEntry`和 `WriteException` 方法将消息写入应用程序的日志侦听器。The `WriteEntry` and `WriteException` methods write messages to the application's log listeners. 可以通过应用程序的配置文件来配置侦听器。The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [演练：更改 My. Log 写入信息](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information) 和使用 [应用程序日志](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs)的位置。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information) and [Working with Application Logs](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs). `My.Application.Log`对象仅适用于客户端应用程序。The `My.Application.Log` object is available only for client applications. 对于 Web 应用程序，请使用 `My.Log` 。For Web applications, use `My.Log`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 下表列出了涉及对象的任务的示例 `My.Application.Log` 。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.Log` object. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将事件信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：写入日志消息How to: Write Log Messages](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages)| |将异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器Write exception information to the application's log listeners|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions)| |确定 `My.Application.Log` 写入信息的位置Determine where `My.Application.Log` writes information|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 在哪里写入信息Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information)| ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：编写日志消息](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确定对象的当前配置 。You can use this property to determine the current configuration of the object. 在客户端应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Application.Log` 。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Log` 。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object.

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象，然后将该对象添加到 集合中。

span.span: Creates a new object and adds it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个新的 ，将其名称设置为 `FileLog` ，并将其配置为记录严重性级别 和更高级别的消息。This method creates a new , sets its name to `FileLog`, and configures it to log messages with severity level and greater. 然后，新的 对象将添加到 集合中。The new object is then added to the collection. 如果尚未配置属性，则调用方法 。The calls the method if the property has not been configured. 可以在应用程序的配置文件中配置跟踪源。The trace source can be configured in the application's configuration file.

summary.span: 获取为 对象提供支持的 对象。

span.span: Gets to the object that underlies the object.
The object that underlies the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确定对象的当前配置 `Log` 。You can use this property to determine the current configuration of the `Log` object. 在客户端应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Application.Log` 。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Log` 。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 这是一个高级成员;除非选择 " **全部** " 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you select the **All** tab. 下表列出了涉及属性的任务的示例 `TraceSource` 。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `TraceSource` property. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |获取对象的每个 `Log` 日志侦听器的信息。Get information for each of the `Log` object's log listeners.|[排除故障：日志侦听器Troubleshooting: Log Listeners](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/troubleshooting-log-listeners)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**|

member this.WriteEntry : string -> unit

param.name: message

span.span: Required.
The message to log.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则返回一个空字符串。

summary.span: 将消息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a message to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteEntry`方法将消息写入应用程序的事件日志侦听器。The `WriteEntry` method writes a message to the application's event log listeners. 在客户端应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Application.Log` 。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Log` 。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解哪些日志侦听器接收该 `WriteEntry` 方法的消息，请参阅 [演练：确定在何处写入信息](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteEntry` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information). 您可以更改默认日志侦听器。You can change default log listeners. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用应用程序日志](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs). 对于不带参数的重载 `id` ， `id` 写入日志的将由下表定义。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the `id` written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|缺省值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `WriteEntry` 。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteEntry` method. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将事件信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：写入日志消息How to: Write Log Messages](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages)| |确定 `Log` 写入信息的位置Determine where `Log` writes information|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 在哪里写入信息Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：编写日志消息](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)] 此代码示例只能在客户端应用程序中运行。This code example can run only within a client application. `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` `My.Log.WriteEntry` 对于 Web 应用程序，将更改为。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` to `My.Log.WriteEntry` for Web applications.

exception.span: 具有部分信任的代码调用该方法，但是写入到需要完全信任的事件日志侦听器。

span.span: Code with partial trust calls the method, but writes to an event log listener that requires full trust.

type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteException (Exception ex);
.method public instance void WriteException(class System.Exception ex) cil managed
Public Sub WriteException (ex As Exception)
public: void WriteException(Exception ^ ex);
member this.WriteException : Exception -> unit

span.span: Required.
Exception to log.

summary.span: 将异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中。

span.span: Writes exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteException`方法将异常中包含的信息写入应用程序的事件日志侦听器。The `WriteException` method writes the information contained in an exception to the application's event log listeners. 在客户端应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Application.Log` 。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序中， `Log` 可以通过对象获取对象 `My.Log` 。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解哪些日志侦听器接收该 `WriteException` 方法的消息，请参阅 [演练：确定在何处写入信息](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteException` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information). 您可以更改默认日志侦听器。You can change default log listeners. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用应用程序日志](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs). 对于不采用参数的重载 `id` ，写入日志的标识符由下表定义。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the identifier written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|缺省值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出了涉及方法的任务的示例 `WriteException` 。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteException` method. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将异常信息写入应用程序的事件日志侦听器。Write exception information to the application's event log listeners.|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions)| |确定 `Log` 写入信息的位置。Determine where `Log` writes information.|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 在哪里写入信息Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteException` 方法记录异常。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteException` method to log exceptions. 取消注释 `Dim` 和 `MsgBox` 行，导致 异常。Uncomment the `Dim` and `MsgBox` lines to cause a exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：记录异常](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions)。For more information, see [How to: Log Exceptions](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 此代码示例只能在客户端应用程序中运行。This code example can run only within a client application. `My.Application.Log.WriteException` `My.Log.WriteException` 对于 Web 应用程序，将更改为。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteException` to `My.Log.WriteException` for Web applications.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 具有部分信任的代码调用该方法，但是写入到需要完全信任的事件日志侦听器。

span.span: Code with partial trust calls the method, but writes to an event log listener that requires full trust.
Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteException (Exception ex, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, string additionalInfo);
.method public instance void WriteException(class System.Exception ex, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, string additionalInfo) cil managed
Public Sub WriteException (ex As Exception, severity As TraceEventType, additionalInfo As String)
public: void WriteException(Exception ^ ex, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType severity, System::String ^ additionalInfo);
member this.WriteException : Exception * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * string -> unit

span.span: Required.
Exception to log.
The type of message.
By default, .

param.name: additionalInfo
param.span: 要追加到消息的字符串。

span.span: String to append to the message.

param.span: 默认情况下为空字符串。

span.span: By default, this is an empty string.
